name: Cuanto
headline: Building the operating system for Latin America's internet creators
description:
We are building the operating system to allow Latin American creators to live from the internet. We started by helping them instantly launch online to monetize their audience and sell over social media.

Online creation is already mainstream in Latin America through the heavy use of social media and video streaming. We are building the platform to make online creation a viable career and social mobility option.

founders.name: Felipe Echandi, Founder
founders.description: Love sci-fi as a way to think about the future. Obsessed with small businesses succeeding.

founders.name: Jose Varela, Founder/CTO
founders.description: 2xFounder/CTO. Worked in B2B wholesale logistics and B2C ecommerce/payment-processing.

generated_description:
**Cuanto: Empowering Latin American Creators**

Founded in 2018 and based in Panama City, Cuanto is on a mission to be the operating system for internet creators throughout Latin America. Think of it as an essential toolkit that enables creators to successfully monetize their passions online—effectively allowing them to build a viable career right from their homes.

Initially starting as a platform to help creators instantly launch online and sell their products through social media, Cuanto has grown into much more. Today, it's facilitating a shift in social mobility for many, tapping into the already robust online creation landscape that’s thriving across Latin America. With over 24,000 users already on board, the platform's influence is only expanding.

Cuanto operates within the fintech and e-commerce sectors, providing a simple, transparent way for creators to set up their online shops. Want to sell online? Signing up takes just five minutes—download the app, answer a few questions, and add your products. It’s designed for ease, making online selling accessible for everyone, from bustling entrepreneurs to side-hustlers.

The costs are straightforward too: only pay a small transaction fee when you make a sale, ensuring that the platform aligns with your success rather than charging upfront costs.

Cuanto is a proud participant of Y Combinator's Batch W19 and is powered by a dedicated team of 13. Its group partner, Nan, further enhances its network and opportunities for growth.

The world of online creation is evolving, and Cuanto is at the forefront, providing the tools and support necessary for creators to thrive. If you’re eager to join this dynamic community, check out their platform at [cuanto.app](https://www.cuanto.app) and start your journey to monetization now. It's time to turn your dreams into a sustainable business!
